      • getWebSession

        public WebSession getWebSession(String id)
        Parameters:
        id - The WebSession id.
        Returns:

      • createWebSession

        public WebSession createWebSession(String username,
                          String password)
        Creates a new WebSession for the given user with their password. If their password doesn't match returns null.
        Parameters:
        username - The unique id for the user.
        password - Their password.
        Returns:
        A new WebSession or null if the password doesn't match the password in the persistent store.

      • removeWebSession

        public WebSession removeWebSession(String id)
        Removes the WebSession from the application.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the session.
        Returns:
        The old WebSession if it existed or null.
